about_the_game:
Get more information, feedback game problems, welcome to join the official QQ group：976944204

A world of swords and magic, a city of many races, and you're a rookie owner who has inherited a tavern. There are tough roads ahead waiting for you.

With a 28-day deadline, you need to utilize everything at hand to make money. Each time you play you will meet different people, buy different equipment and experience different events. Utilizing their characteristics and matching them in the right combinations can help you find life from heavy debts, and even break through everyone's expectations to become a generation of tavern tycoons.

No need to manually set up the location, you can just load up the decorations and add to the popularity of the tavern to keep the customers coming back.



——————————————————————————————————————————————

Employees of different professions and ranks, each with distinctive skills, are the key to making the tavern thrive. The employees also have colorful lives and stories, and everyone deserves a deeper friendship.



——————————————————————————————————————————————

With hundreds of ingredients, dishes and drinks, you'll need to carefully organize your tavern's menu, and sometimes more recipes aren't better.



——————————————————————————————————————————————

The store and guild system help you to get all kinds of equipments and props, and you can also organize activities to gain benefits. Special ingredients needed for recipes also have to be entrusted to adventurers to collect for you, and there are more mechanics hidden in the staff.





——————————————————————————————————————————————

Baiying Tavern is as much about business as it is about life. Whatever you're looking for, it's worth a revisit.

short_description: You're a rookie owner who has inherited a tavern. Set up tables and chairs, buy equipment, issue commissions, fulfill orders, make hundreds of different styles of food and drinks. Recruit employees with different personalities and skills. Also learn their stories and let them into your life.
